question: 俳優
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>superior</kanji> <kanji>haiku</kanji> requires someone really famous and well known to read it... it's just on that level. Who is super well known and who deserves to read this superior haiku? A great <vocabulary>actor</vocabulary>, perhaps?
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
